Artefact.Name: Sword of Striking
Artefact.Description: +1 to Hit

Artefact.Name: Sword of Battle
Artefact.Description: +1 Attack

Artefact.Name: Sword of Might
Artefact.Description: +1 Strenght

Artefact.Name: Biting Blade
Artefact.Description: -1 Armour save

Artefact.Name: Enchanted shield
Artefact.Description: 5+ Armour save

Artefact.Name: Talisman of Protection
Artefact.Description: 6+ ward save

Artefact.Name: Staff of Sorcery
Artefact.Description: +1 to dispell

Artefact.Name: Dispell Scroll
Artefact.Description: automatically dispel an enemy spell, one use only

Artefact.Name: Power Stone
Artefact.Description: +2 dice to cast a spell

Artefact.Name: War Banner
Artefact.Description: +1 Combat Resolution

Artefact.Name: Blade of Realities
Artefact.Description: For each successful hit inflicted by this weapon, the victim must pass a Leadership test or be slain instantly. No armour, ward or regeneration saves are allowed against this special attack. If the tests are passed, roll to Wound and save as normal

Artefact.Name: Blade of Revered Tzanuki
Artefact.Description: +1 Strenght. No armour saves are allowed against attacks made by the Blade of Revered Tzanuki

Artefact.Name: Scimitar of the Sun Resplendent
Artefact.Description: The wielder of this blade has +2 Attacks

Artefact.Name: Stegadon War-spear
Artefact.Description: Lance. In addition, the bearer's mount inflicts 2D6+1 impact hits rather then the normal 1D6+1

Artefact.Name: Staff of the Lost Sun
Artefact.Description: The staff is treated as a short bow that has a Strenght of 5, and 3x Multiple Shots

Artefact.Name: Piranha Blade
Artefact.Description: Any unsaved wound inflicted by the Piranha Blade is multipled into two wounds

Artefact.Name: Dagger of Sotek
Artefact.Description: Confers on the bearer the killing blow ability. In addition, the bearer causes Fear in Skaven

Artefact.Name: Sword of the Hornet
Artefact.Description: The bearer of this sword has the 'Always Strikes First' rule

Artefact.Name: Burning Blade of Chotec
Artefact.Description: Flaming attacks. Targets struck by the Burning of Chotek suffer a -2 penalty to their armour save in addition to any modifiers from the user's Strength

Artefact.Name: Hide of the Cold Ones
Artefact.Description: Heavy armour. The wearer causes Fear and has +1 Toughness, but becomes subject to Stupidity

Artefact.Name: Sacred Stegadon Helm
Artefact.Description: Confers +1 to the model's armour save, which may be combined with other armour as normal. In addition, the helm adds +1 to the model's Leadership

Artefact.Name: Shield of the Mirrored Pool
Artefact.Description: Shield. Any magic missile that strikes the bearer or any unit he is with is reflected on the roll of 2+ on a D6. If the spell is reflected, the results of the magic missile are resolved against the caster of the spell or the unit the character is with. This in turn cannot be dispelled

Artefact.Name: The Mainming Shield
Artefact.Description: Shield. The Mainming Shield confres +1 Attack to the bearer. This additional attack is worked out using the base Strength of the wielder, and counts as magical

Artefact.Name: The Horn of Kygor
Artefact.Description: Friendly cavalry within 12" are Stubborn. Enemy cavalry Fear the bearer

Artefact.Name: Horned One
Artefact.Description: Cold One. The Horned One has a Movement of 8, an Initiative of 3, and is not subject to Stupidity

Artefact.Name: Divine Plaque of Protection
Artefact.Description: The Slann's Shield of the Old Ones ward save in increased from 4+ to 2+ against the ranged attacks

Artefact.Name: War Drum of Xahutec
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: +1 Leadership to friendly unit attempting to rally
Artefact.Description: The presence of enemy units within 8" does not stop the bearer and any unit he is eith from marching. In addition any friendly unit attemptiong to rally within 12" of the War Drum gains an additional +a Leadership, up to a maximum of 10, so long as the bearer is not fleeing

Artefact.Name: Blood Statuette of Spite
Artefact.Description: Bounded Spell. Power Level 5. One use only. Once per game, the user may cast the spell bound within the statuette. The spell may be cast on any enemy character. That character must immediately take Toughness test. If this test is failed, then the model loses a Wound with no armour saves allowed. If the model takes a wound, it must immediately take another Toughness test, losing another wound if it fails again. This continues until either the model passes a Toughness test or is slain

Artefact.Name: Charm of the Jaguar Warrior
Artefact.Description: Bound Spell. Power Level 5. The Charm of th Jaguar Warrior contains the bound spell Steed of Shadows, as detailed in the Lore of Shadow in the Warhammer rulebook. The spell may only be cast on the bearer himself

Artefact.Name: Cloak of Feathers
Artefact.Description: The wearer of the cloack may fly

Artefact.Name: Carnosaur Pendant
Artefact.Description: Once the bearer has inficted a wound, he will become immediately subject to Frenzy. The bearer will never lose its Frenzy, even if it is beaten in combat. See the main rulebook for details of Frenzy

Artefact.Name: Curse-Charm of Tepok
Artefact.Description: Only one use. When the enemy rolls on the Miscast table, the bearer of the Curse-Charm of Tepok may force him to re-roll the result. This second result stands

Artefact.Name: Bane Head
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Unsaved wounds doubled for nominated target
Artefact.Description: Nominate an enemy character at the start of the battle. All unsaved wounds caused by the bearer on the nominated target are doubled

Artefact.Name: Dragonfly of Quicksilver
Artefact.Description: If both players have models with the Scout ability, the Lizardmen player adds 1 to his dice roll when rolling to see eho deploys their Scouts first

Artefact.Name: Venom of the Firefly Frog
Artefact.Description: All mundane weapons used by the bearer are coated with this venom. In addition to the weapons normal rules, all attackes made with them count as Poisoned Attacks and magical. Mundane weapons that already make Poisoned Attacks may re-roll the dice to hit

Artefact.Name: Cupped Hands of the Old Ones
Artefact.Description: One use only. If the bearer miscasts, roll a D6. On a roll of 1 the bearer suffers the results of the miscast as normal. On 2+ the miscast is ignored and if there is an enemy Wizard within line of sight he will suffer its effects, ignoring result 5-6

Artefact.Name: Cube of Darkness
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: On 4+ all Ramains in Play spells are dispelled
Artefact.Description: One use only. This is used as a Dispell Scroll. When used, roll a D6. On 4+ all Remains in Play spells are automatically dispelled and the Magic phase ends immediately

Artefact.Name: Rode of the Storm
Artefact.Description: Bound Spell. Power Level 6. One use only. The Rod of the Storm contains the bound spell Uranon's Thunderbold as detailed in the Lore of Heavens in the Warhammer rulebook

Artefact.Name: Diadem of power
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Two power dice save for dispel
Artefact.Description: The Wizard may save up to two of his unused power dice at the end of his Magic phase and add them to his side's dispel dice pool in the next enemy Magic phase

Artefact.Name: Plaque of Tepok
Artefact.Description: The Wizard bearing the plaque knows one more spell then he would normally be allowed

Artefact.Name: Aura of Quetzl
Artefact.Description: All close combat attacks made against the bearer suffer -1 to Hit

Artefact.Name: Glyph Necklace
Artefact.Description: The character wearing this gains a 5+ ward save

Artefact.Name: Amulet of Itza
Artefact.Description: One use only. The character wearing this amulet has a 2+ ward save against the first wound suffered, after Armour saves have boon taken

Artefact.Name: Totem of Prophecy
Artefact.Description: The unit causes Fear

Artefact.Name: Plaque of Dominion
Artefact.Description: The plaque can be used at the beginning of any enemy turn. Each enemy Wizard within 18" that can draw a line of sight to the plaque or the unit it is with must take a Stupidity test

Artefact.Name: Sun Standart of Chotec
Artefact.Description: Missles fired at the unit from within 12" suffer an additional -2 to Hit, or -1 to Hit if fired from over 12" away

Artefact.Name: Huanchi's Blessed Totem
Artefact.Description: One use only. The unit can add D6" to its charge move. If the charge is failed, the unit will move forward at its normal movement rate

Artefact.Name: Jaguar Standard
Artefact.Description: The unit pursues an extra D6"

Artefact.Name: Skavenpelt Banner
Artefact.Description: The unit is subject to Frenzy until defeat in combet. In addition the unit Hates all units in the Skaven army

Special.SpecialRuleDescription: Strength 5 hit for any wound inflicted

HandWeapon.SpecialRuleDescription: D6 Strength 4 hits within 12", bound spell Level 5

Special.SpecialRuleDescription: All Skinks in army Hate all Skaven units

Option.Name: Focus of Mystery
Option.SpecialRuleDescription: Mage-Priest knows every spell in lore

Option.Name: Higher State
Option.SpecialRuleDescription: Only magical attacks have any effect

Option.Name: Becalming Cogitation
Option.SpecialRuleDescription: Enemy Wizard discarded any roll 6 made

HandWeapon.Name: The Star-Stone Mace
HandWeapon.SpecialRuleDescription: Enemy magic weapon count as mundane

Armour.Name: The Helm of Prime Guardian
Armour.SpecialRuleDescription: No Scout may set up within 20"

Special.SpecialRuleDescription: Immune to effects of Killing Blow
All spells from the Lore of Heavens
May join units if Terradon Riders
